text: I loved you like the first light after a long night.
Your name is the softest place my thoughts can rest.
In the arithmetic of love, one plus one equals infinity.
You are the poem every silence was trying to say.
My heart wears your name like a lantern.
Every road I take returns to you.
Your smile is the house where my days live.
The moon learned its gentleness from you.
Between your hands, time becomes honey.
Some people bring flowers; you bring spring.
